detailsEvent: Welcome everyone, this is a channel to post notifications about the wedding.\n\nWe hope you enjoy the wedding day!

Please arrive for the civil ceremony at between 10:15 and 10:45 tomorrow. The address is:

Rudding Park Hotel,
HG3 1JH
The civil ceremony is located in the Drawing Room at Rudding House.
The civil ceremony will start in 5 minutes, please set your phone to silent or turn it off.
